column3: Moved updating of app_env from gapc_connection_req_ind_handler() to default_app_on_connection()
Easy timer ID is passed as a parameter to timer callback function
SUOTA callback is called with parameter SUOTAR_IN_PROGRESS to notify the application that SUOTA is ongoing
Fixed arch_console not to block in interrupt context
Added llc_con_update_ind() patch in system library
Changed mkimage utility to search for both SW_VERSION and SDK_VERSION symbols in the version file
Changed rf_rssi_convert() to return the RSSI in dBm
